name: 王多柏
objective: Analysis and design of RF integrated circuits and system.
schedule:
Ch1: Introduction to wireless communication from the aspects of system
Ch2: Basic Concepts in RF Design
Ch3: Modulation and Detection
Ch4: Multiple Access Techniques and Wireless Standards
Ch5: Transceiver Architectures
Ch6: Low-Noise Amplifiers and Mixers
Ch7: Oscillators
Ch8: Frequency Synthesizer
Ch9: Power Amplifier
Simulation with SpectreRF:
LNA
Mixer
VCO
scorePolicy:
Homework: 30%
Project: 30%
Final report: 30%
In-Class performance: 10%
materials:
Textbook:
1. RF Microelectronics, Prentice-Hall, 1998. Behzad Razavi.(代理商: 新月書局)
2. Microwave Transistor Amplifiers: Analysis and Design, 2/E, 1997 (代理商:高立圖書)
